sourcesContent:
import {
  Box,
  Text,
  VStack,
  Input,
  Flex,
  FormControl,
  FormLabel,
  Button,
} from "@chakra-ui/react";

import { useForm } from "react-hook-form";
import * as yup from "yup";
import { yupResolver } from "@hookform/resolvers/yup";

export const Login = () => {
  const { register, handleSubmit } = useForm();

  const onSubmitFunction = (data) => {
    console.log(data);
  };

  return (
    <Flex
      width="100vw"
      height="100vh"
      bgColor="#121214"
      direction="column"
      justify="center"
      align="center"
    >
      <Text color="#FF577F" fontWeight="bold">
        Kenzie Hub
      </Text>
      <VStack
        w="280px"
        h="400px"
        bgColor="#212529"
        p="15px 20px"
        borderRadius="4px"
        mt="10px"
      >
        <Text color="#FFF" fontSize="lg">
          Login
        </Text>
        <form onSubmit={handleSubmit(onSubmitFunction)}>
          <FormControl>
            <Box w="100%">
              <FormLabel color="#F8F9FA" fontSize="xs">
                Email
              </FormLabel>
            </Box>
            <Input
              placeholder="Digite seu email"
              bg="#343B41"
              {...register("email")}
            />
            <Box w="100%" mt="20px">
              <FormLabel color="#F8F9FA" fontSize="xs">
                Senha
              </FormLabel>
            </Box>
            <Input placeholder="Digite sua senha" bg="#343B41" />
            <Button
              w="100%"
              mt="20px"
              bgColor="#FF577F"
              color="#FFF"
              type="submit"
              borderRadius="4px"
              fontWeight="light"
              {...register("password")}
            >
              Entrar
            </Button>
          </FormControl>
        </form>
        <Box pt="30px">
          <Text color="#868E96" fontSize="xs">
            Ainda não possui uma conta?
          </Text>
        </Box>
        <Button
          isFullWidth
          bgColor="#868E96"
          color="#FFF"
          borderRadius="4px"
          fontWeight="light"
        >
          Cadastre-se
        </Button>
      </VStack>
    </Flex>
  );
};
